targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, avg(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_bucket{source_cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$service.*", uri!~"(/health)|(/actuator.*)"}[1m])) by (le, uri))
histogram_quantile(0.95, avg(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_bucket{source_cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$service.*", uri!~"(/health)|(/actuator.*)"}[1m])) by (le, uri))
histogram_quantile(0.999, avg(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_bucket{source_cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$service.*", uri!~"(/health)|(/actuator.*)"}[1m])) by (le, uri))

sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{source_cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$service.*", uri!~"(/health)|(/actuator.*)"}[1m])) by (uri) / sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{source_cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$service.*", uri!~"(/health)|(/actuator.*)"}[1m])) by (uri)
histogram_quantile(0.5, avg(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_bucket{source_cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job="$service",  uri!~"(/health)|(/actuator.*)"}[1m])) by (le, uri))

panels.title: Load Redirection Entity and Url Time

targets.expr:
sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{source_cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$service.*", area="heap"})
/ sum(jvm_memory_max_bytes{source_cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$service.*", area="heap"})

sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{source_cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$service.*", area="nonheap"})
/ sum(jvm_memory_max_bytes{source_cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$service.*", area="nonheap"})
